title.rendered: Lumiere Runway spotlights incredible designers at Hollywood glam-themed fashion show

content.rendered:
Showstopping designs lit up the Lumiere Runway, dazzled guests, and raised money for local charity Create Now 

LOS ANGELES, California: On Saturday, June 12, 2021,  

24Fashion TV is proud to be the media sponsor of another glamorous event featuring a stunning location, and incredible designers. Lumiere Runway hosted this eagerly awaited fashion showcase featuring the latest collections of local established designers including Sara Rose, Naids Fashion, Freedom Fashion by Stephano Musa, High Status, Couture Aprons, Elegant Essentials, Donna Leah Designs, and Verita Couture. Behind the scenes, the Michael Vincent Academy was behind the makeup on all the models showcasing these designs. Special thanks go out to Tal B and Michael Vincent of the Academy! 24Fashion TV was represented by co-founders: creator/producer Victoria Unikel, editor-in-chief Galina Antonova, and CTO Gene Avakyan.

Over 150 guests enjoyed a glamourous Hollywood-themed evening fit for the stars with scrumptious five-star food from Savory Roads Catering, a vibrant red carpet and an eloquently stocked bar completed by beverage sponsor, Loft and Bear. 

Guests attended the show at the coveted Bel Air Stradella Court Mansion, where stars like Elton John and Nicki Minaj previously recorded music videos. They enjoyed the musical and runway talents of some of Californias best talent, including Shannon K, a local musician who stopped the show as she performed and walked the runway donning pieces from designer Verita Coutures jaw-dropping collection. 

Five percent of all proceeds from the event went to the local charity Create Now, which works to empower at-risk and high-risk youth and young adults to help them heal and thrive. 

Other exceptional and vivacious talent in attendance included: 

Courtney Revolution, Influencer 

Bronwyn Leigh Jones, Celebrity Real Estate Agent 

Alessia Vernazza, Actress 

Tolula Adeyemi, Actress 

Clementine Heath, Actress 

Verina Marcel, Model 

Keri Ann Kimball, Film Producer 

Tiffany Stanley, Supermodel 

Christin Devine, Fox News Anchor  

Qveen Herby, Singer @qveenherby  

Amy Roiland, Influencer @afashionnerd 

24Fashion TV co-founders: editor-in-chief Galina-Antonova, creator/producer Victoria Unikel and CTO Gene Avakyan
